asap.speechengine

Class TimedWavTTSUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • asap.realizer.planunit.TimedAbstractPlanUnit
      • asap.speechengine.TimedAbstractSpeechUnit
        • asap.speechengine.TimedTTSUnit
          • asap.speechengine.TimedWavTTSUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    asap.realizer.planunit.TimedPlanUnit

    public class TimedWavTTSUnit
extends TimedTTSUnit
    Plans speech by generating a .wav file, then uses that .wav file to generate the speech
    Author:
    welberge
